statements: UPDATE competitors_social_media_data SET post_content = 'Updated post content' WHERE competitor_id = 1;

UPDATE analysis_results SET sentiment_score = 4.2, engagement_level = 100 WHERE competitor_id = 2;
UPDATE competitor_data SET competitor_name = 'New Competitor Name', social_media_platform = 'Twitter' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE Likes SET account_id = 2, post_id = 3 WHERE like_id = 5;
UPDATE Social_Media_Accounts SET follower_count = 1000, post_count = post_count + 1 WHERE account_id = 5
